meanings.definition: To enroll as a student in a college or university.
meanings.sent1: She is matriculating at the university next fall.
meanings.sent2: Many students are matriculating for the upcoming semester.
meanings.sent3: Matriculating into college is an exciting new chapter in life.
meanings.sent4: Her journey of matriculating into higher education began with determination.
meanings.sent5: Matriculating into university opens doors to new opportunities.

meanings.definition: To be admitted or accepted into a group or organization.
meanings.sent1: He is matriculating into the exclusive club.
meanings.sent2: New members are matriculating into the organization.
meanings.sent3: Matriculating into the secret society felt like joining a mysterious group.
meanings.sent4: Her ideas were matriculating into the team's creative process.
meanings.sent5: Matriculating into the inner circle brought a sense of belonging.
